images.photo: <head>Hello!</head><body>Welcome to the new 3D Sphere Gallery</body>
<head>Configure it using the panel below.</head><body>Then download it for FREE.</body>
<head>Awesome 3D effect.</head>Works well with a high & low number of photos.<body></body>
<head>Two types of animation!</head><body>Horizontal and vertical.</body>
Use this HTML/CSS formatted text.You can event insert linkshere..
<head>All the assets are skinnable.</head></body>Give customizing them a try!</body>
images.video: <head>Also supports video files!</head></body>With custom video player skins.</body>
images.photo: <head>You can vary the number of pictures</head><body>that the component displays in any ring of the sphere.</body>
<head>2 roll over picture behaviours :</head><body>wind(neat animation) & expand.</body>
<head>The sphere spins by default(General>defaultSpeed).</head><body>Set "defaultSpeed" to 0 to stop the animation when there is no interaction with the mouse.</body>
<head>Put your own images in the images folder.</head><body>And update the images.xml file accordingly.</body>
<head>Position the text on the images</head><body>either in the top or bottom positions.</body>
<head>For best results</head><body>make sure that the total number of photos divides evenly by the "totalInRing" attribute.</body>
